item.title: .NET Templates and Database Migrations
item.description: .NET Custom Templates Testing Locally ## Clone and navigate to repository cd templates/bkr.microservice ## Install template dotnet new -i . ## Create new service mkdir MyService && cd MyService dotnet new bkr.microservice --name Cheese.Cake Distributing via Package ## Create package dotnet pack ## Install from package dotnet new -i ./bin/Debug/Bkr.Template.Service.1.0.0.nupkg ## Use template mkdir MyService && cd MyService dotnet new bkr.microservice --name Cheese.Cake Template Structure When adding new projects, include them in both solutions:
